content: **description ** crafted from soft yarn these scrunchies are easy and quick to make you can create them in any color and choose between a simple design or a wavy style making them a lovely handmade gift for both loved ones and yourself **level ** easy **yarns ** - **brand ** erica zeeman - **material ** 58% cotton 42% acryl - 1 yarn = 50g = 66m - **quantity ** 1 mustard yellow yarn or 1 salmon pink yarn 1 white yarns **tools ** crochet hook 6mm needle hair tie 5cm diameter
